source.title: Getting Started: Installation | Next.js
source.description: Installation methods using create-next-app CLI or manual setup, system requirements, configuration prompts for TypeScript, linting, Tailwind, App Router, creating app directory with layout and page files, development server, and absolute imports.

source.title: Getting Started: Image Optimization | Next.js
source.description: Image component for automatic size optimisation, WebP format, lazy loading, blur placeholders, local images from public folder with automatic dimensions, remote images requiring width/height props, and remotePatterns security configuration.

source.title: Getting Started: Project Structure | Next.js
source.description: Complete folder and file conventions including top-level folders, routing files (layout, page, loading, error, route), dynamic routes with brackets, route groups with parentheses, private folders with underscores, parallel and intercepted routes, metadata conventions, and colocation patterns.
